description.value:
The first time you are bloodied in each encounter, choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. You gain resist 5 to that damage type until the end of the encounter. At 11th level, this resistance increases to 10, and at 21st level, this resistance increases to 15.
Also, until the end of your next turn, your allies provoke opportunity attacks from you. You must make every opportunity attack you can.
